1551.quoteText:
you grant us a perpetual (for questions you ask only), non-exclusive, royalty-free and fully-paid-up, and fully sub-licensable right to access, view, use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, create derivative works from, distribute, copy, and display such material throughout the world in any form, media, or technology now known or hereafter developed.
You also permit any other user to view, copy, access, store, or reproduce such material for that user’s personal use.
1551.title: very broad

tosdr.case: very broad

5390.quoteText: ASKfm uses cookies and similar technologies, such as web beacons or pixel tags, to deliver, measure, and improve our services in various ways.
5390.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

5392.quoteText: To find out more about their cookies and the privacy choices they offer, please visit the following links: Google Analytics, Quantcast, and ScoreCard.
5392.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service refers users to external documents for more information

5395.quoteText: we do not currently recognize or respond to browser-initiated Do Not Track signals, as the internet industry is still working on Do Not Track standards, implementations, and solutions.
5395.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

5396.quoteText: Sorry, but you can’t use ASKfm if you are under 13 years old. If you are under 13 years of age, you are not permitted to access or use the Services. If we become aware that you are using the Services even though you are under 13 and not permitted to do so, we will deactivate your account and attempt to block you from accessing the Services.
5396.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age

5397.quoteText:
You must keep your password confidential and, other than sharing it with your parent or guardian if you are a minor, you should not tell anyone your password or let anyone else access your account.
(Parents and guardians might also find some useful information here).
Sharing your password might lead to all of your posts, messages and personal information being leaked or someone impersonating or pretending to be you.
If you don’t keep your password confidential or give it to anyone other than your parent or guardian, we are not responsible for anyone accessing or using your account, including reading or sending messages from it.
If you think that someone else might be using your account, you must let us know immediately using the contact information below.
5397.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

5398.quoteText: We can also block or respond to content that we determine is otherwise objectionable or as set forth in the TOU.
5398.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms

tosdr.case: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms

5399.quoteText:
Should you choose to leave the Services, rather than deactivate your account, you may do so by selecting the “I want to leave ASKfm” tab on the Contact Us page.
Once received, we will process your request to leave as soon as practicable.
5399.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

5400.quoteText: Warning: After you have deactivated your account or left the Services, questions may still appear on the Services, but will be anonymized and no longer associated with you directly (in other words, a question you asked on your friend’s profile will still be visible, but will not include your username).
5400.title: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information

tosdr.case: This service will continue using anonymized user-generated content even after erasure of personal information

5401.quoteText: YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” AND THAT YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES SHALL BE AT YOUR SOLE RISK.
5401.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

5402.quoteText:
ALL SALES ARE FINAL.
YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT NEITHER WE NOR ANY APP STORE PROVIDER IS REQUIRED TO PROVIDE A REFUND FOR ANY REASON, AND THAT YOU WILL NOT RECEIVE MONEY OR OTHER COMPENSATION FOR UNUSED IN-APP PURCHASES WHEN AN ACCOUNT IS CLOSED, WHETHER SUCH CLOSURE WAS VOLUNTARY OR INVOLUNTARY UNLESS OTHERWISE REQUIRED BY APPLICABLE LAW.
5402.title: no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy

5403.quoteText: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, THE ASKFM PARTIES MAKE NO WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS THAT WE HAVE THE NECESSARY SKILL TO RENDER THE SERVICES OR THAT THE SERVICES HAVE BEEN AND WILL BE PROVIDED WITH DUE SKILL, CARE AND DILIGENCE OR ABOUT THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF THE SERVICES’ CONTENT
5403.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

5405.quoteText: Information provided by our users through the Services may contain links to third-party websites, mobile apps or other services that are not owned or controlled by us. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites. In addition, we will not and cannot censor or edit the content of any third-party site. By using the Services, you expressly acknowledge and agree that the ASKfm Parties shall not be responsible for any damages, claims or other liability arising from or related to your use of any third-party website.
5405.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

tosdr.case: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

5407.quoteText: We may collect general information (e.g. IP address, zip code) about your location, and may use that information to customize the Services with location-based information, advertising, and features that need to know your location to work properly. By accessing and using the Services, you consent to this collection and processing of location information. If you choose to turn off location services on your device, some features may not be available to you.
5407.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

5408.quoteText: We may assist the police or other law enforcement agencies with their requests, or produce information in response to legal process where we, in good faith, believe that such disclosure is required by law, or to protect our rights and property, or the safety of individual users or the public, or where otherwise permitted by this Privacy Policy.
5408.title: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

tosdr.case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve user data.

5409.quoteText:
In general, please be careful and responsible whenever you are online.
Should you choose to voluntarily disclose information through the Services, such as by submitting a question to another user or by answering a question to be posted on your profile, that information can be viewed publicly and people can copy content that is posted on the Internet.
It could also be collected and used by third parties without our or your knowledge, which may result in unsolicited messages from other individuals or third parties.
You should not share personal information that might allow others to contact or locate you or other users, and you should think before you post.
5409.title: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

tosdr.case: The service informs users about the risk of publishing personal info online

5410.quoteText:
In order to respond to the claims of violation of the rights of third parties and/or to protect the rights, property, and safety of ASKfm, our employees, Registered and Guest Users, or the public.
This may involve the sharing of your information with law enforcement, government agencies, courts, and/or other organizations
5410.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: Your personal data is given to third parties

5411.quoteText:
Our partners also may collect information directly from your device, such as your IP address, device ID (which in some countries is considered as personal data) or similar information regarding the location of your mobile device.
may combine our personal and non-personal information about you with information from other sources.
and may place or recognize a unique cookie on your browser.
If we are sharing ANY data that is considered to be personal data by the appropriate laws of the country in which you live, we will always ask your consent before we use your data in this way (and you can ask us to stop at any time).
5411.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

5412.quoteText:
We keep your information and store it safely as long as you are using the Services.
After you close your account we still keep some or all of your information for up to 9 months.
It is important that we retain your data for this short period after cancellation to ensure that we can answer any payment or other account related queries, or provide information to third parties in line with our disclosure provisions outlined in this policy, e.g., assisting police investigations.
5412.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

5413.quoteText:
By giving us any personal information or by using the applications available on the Services, you agree that your personal information may be transferred to and stored and processed in our and our third-party vendors’ facilities in various countries around the globe, including the United States.
These countries may have privacy laws that differ from the laws in your country or the laws of Ireland.
5413.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

5414.quoteText:
<li>As we continue to develop our business, we may sell, buy, merge or partner with other companies or businesses, or sell some or all of our assets.
In such transactions, user information may be among the transferred assets
5414.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
